text: Does the game open a window?
Does it have title Hacking?
Does it have aspect ratio 6:5?
Does it have a black background?
Does the game display a header?
Does it consist of two content lines followed by a blank line?
Does the first content line indicate debug mode?
Does the second content line indicate 4 attempts left?
Is it in the top left corner of the window?
Does it use small font size?
Is it green on black?
Does it have a 0.3 second pause after displaying each line?
Does the game display a password list?
Does it consist of 13 content lines followed by a blank line?
Does each content line contain one password?
Is it directly below the header?
Does it use small font size?
Is it green on black?
Does it have a 0.3 second pause after displaying each line?
Does the game prompt for a guess?
Does it indicate the player should enter a password?
Is it directly below the password list?
Does it use small font size?
It is green on black?
Does the game wait for the enter key to be pressed?

text: Does the game decrement the number of attempts left?
Does it indicate 3 attempts left?
Does the game prompt for a guess?
Does it indicate the player should enter a password?

It is green on black?

text: Does the game clear the window?
Does the game display a success outcome?
Does it contain four content lines separated by three blank lines?

Does the fourth content line prompt to press enter for exit?
Is it in the center of the window?
Does it use small font size?
Is it green on black?
Does it have a 0.3 second pause after displaying each line?
Does the game wait for the enter key to be pressed?

attributes.text: It has title Hacking
It has aspect ratio 6:5
It has a black background
It consists of two content lines followed by a blank line
The first content line indicates debug mode
The second content line indicates 4 attempt lefts
It is in the top left corner of the window

description.text: The game displays a password list

attributes.text: It consists of 13 content lines followed by a blank line
Each content line contains one password
It is directly below the header

description.text: The game repeatedly prompts for a guess and decrements the number of attempts left

attributes.text: If the player has not made a correct guess yet
If there are more than zero attempts remaining
The prompt indicates the player should enter the password
The prompt is below the password list or the previous prompt

description.text: During the guess repetition, the game displays a warning

attributes.text: If there is exactly 1 attempt remaining
It indicates the player will be locked out
It is in the bottom right corner of the window

description.text: The player enters a guess and presses the enter key
The game displays a success outcome

attributes.text: If the guess is correct
The second and third content lines indicate success

description.text: The game displays a failure outcome

attributes.text: If the guess is incorrect
The second and third content lines indicate failure

description.text: The player presses the enter key to exit the program
Every text object has common attribute(s)

attributes.text: It uses small font size
It is green on black

description.text: Every non-prompt text object has common attribute(s)

attributes.text: It has a 0.3 second pause after displaying each line
It contains four content lines separated by three blank lines
The first content line is the guess
The fourth content line is a prompt to press enter for exit
It is in the center of the window
